title: Establishes the education mandate relief act of 2011
summary: Establishes the education mandate relief act; authorizes the board of education to enter into piggyback contracts with another school district for transportation services and directs BOCES to convene committees to recommend options for school district consolidation and shared services.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the general municipal law, in relation to enacting the education mandate relief act of 2011
